data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting And Financial Results For The Quarter And Period Ended December 31, 2022
data.news_body:
Financial Results

Unaudited Standalone Financial Results of the Company and Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results of the Company and its subsidiaries, for the quarter and period ended December 31, 2022, along with Limited Review Reports of the Auditors thereon, which have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at its respective meetings held on February 2, 2023, are enclosed herewith.

Press Release and Investor Presentation

We also enclose herewith the copy of the Press Release and Investor Presentation with regards to the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and period ended December 31, 2022.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On August 3, 2021
data.news_body: Further to our letters dated June 23, 2021 and July 16, 2021 and pursuant to the Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements), Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), we enclose herewith the Unaudited Standalone Financial Results of the Company and Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results of the Company and its subsidiaries for the quarter ended June 30, 2021 along with Limited Review Reports of the Auditors thereon, which have been reviewed by the Audit Committee at its meeting held on August 2, 2021, and approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today, August 3, 2021.

data.caption: Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2021
data.news_body:
We enclose herewith the Unaudited Standalone Financial Results of the Company and Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results of the Company and its subsidiaries for the quarter ended June 30, 2021 along with Limited Review Reports of the Auditors thereon, which have been reviewed by the Audit Committee at its meeting held on August 2, 2021, and approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today, August 3, 2021.

We also enclose herewith the copy of Press Release and Investor Presentation with regards to the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended June 30, 2021.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body:
We refer to our letter dated May 6, 2021 (submitted earlier in the day) on the captioned subject, we enclose herewith the revised Investor Presentation for the analysts/investors on the financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021.

You are requested to ignore the copy of the Investor Presentation submitted earlier in the day and treat the Investor Presentation enclosed herewith as the final.

Inconvenience caused is regretted.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation

You are requested to ignore the copy of the Investor Presentation submitted earlier in the day and treat the Investor Presentation enclosed herewith as the final.

Inconvenience caused is regretted.
